class.name: HLTCommonParameters
class.description: Common configuration parameters for bootstraping the HLT framework used by HLT trigger implementation classes

attribute.name: messageSvcType
attribute.description: The implementation of the message service to use.

attribute.name: jobOptionsSvcType
attribute.description: Implementation of the jobOptions service to use.

attribute.name: dllName
attribute.description: The name of the library containing the Gaudi bootstrap code

attribute.name: factoryName
attribute.description: Name of the factory function inside dllName that can bootstrap Gaudi.

class.name: HLTImplementationDB
class.description: OKS type for HLT running through a database connection

attribute.name: instance
attribute.description: The set of chains to use for HLT (L2 or EF).

attribute.name: hltPrescaleKey
attribute.description: Configuration key for HLT prescale set

relationship.name: HLTCommonParameters
relationship.description: Relationshipt to common HLT configuration parameters.

class.name: HLTImplementationDBPython
class.description: OKS type for HLT running through a database connection including Python pre/postCommand. This is for debugging purposes only and should not be used for online running.

attribute.name: preCommand
attribute.description: A set of python commands or script to be executed before DB configuration.

attribute.name: postCommand
attribute.description: A set of python commands or script to be executed after DB configuration.

class.name: HLTImplementationJobOptions
class.description: OKS type for python JobOption HLT running.

attribute.name: jobOptionsPath
attribute.description: Path (full or relative) to the top-level jobotions you want run with.

attribute.name: pythonSetupFile
attribute.description: The bootstrapping python file for the PSC

attribute.name: showInclude
attribute.description: If we should show the files we include() as we go.

attribute.name: logLevel
attribute.description: The logging level to be set at the MessageService

attribute.name: tracePattern
attribute.description: If we should trace some particular include()'s

attribute.name: preCommand
attribute.description: A set of python commands to be executed just before the execution of your top-level jobOptions.

attribute.name: postCommand
attribute.description: A set of python commands to be executed just after reading your top-level python joboptions, near the end of the configuration phase

relationship.name: HLTCommonParameters
relationship.description: Common parameters that dictate common behavior between python jobOptions and DB implementations of the PSC configuration
